item.title: Centos
item.description: Centos 常用包 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 yum -y install gcc gcc-c++ autoconf libjpeg libjpeg-devel libpng \ libpng-devel freetype freetype-devel libxml2 libxml2-devel zlib \ zlib-devel glibc glibc-devel glib2 glib2-devel bzip2 bzip2-devel \ ncurses ncurses-devel curl curl-devel e2fsprogs e2fsprogs-devel \ krb5 krb5-devel libidn libidn-devel open openssl openssl-devel \ openldap openldap-devel nss_ldap openldap-clients openldap-servers \ libmcrypt libmcrypt-devel mhash mhash-devel automake cmake emacs vimnn RPM 常用命令
